conversations.conversation: What do you see your partner as and what is there roll in your life?
Love builds bridge were there are non & Life without Love is like a tree without fruit..LOVE YOU ALL ALWAYS.
The more we put into our relationship, the more we get out of them.
Wisdom isn't about not making mistakes but about learning to escape afterwards with our DIGNITY and SANITY intact.
Luv is a choice.When you make a choice to luv someone,you invariably made the choice to give them your all...
